channel.title: Getting-starteds on Flowbite Mithril

item.title: Quickstart
item.description: Getting started # You can install Flowbite Mithril to any Node.js project. You’ll need to be familiar with Node.js, and have it installed. Setup Tailwind CSS # Install Tailwind CSS: npm i autoprefixer postcss tailwindcss npx tailwindcss init -p Point Tailwind CSS to files you have class="..." in: module.exports = { content: ["./src/**/*.js"], theme: { extend: {}, }, plugins: [], }; Add Tailwind CSS to a CSS file: @tailwind base; @tailwind components; @tailwind utilities; Install Flowbite Mithril # Install Flowbite and Flowbite Mithril:
